__e: Some people think that they can guess what the origin was of the object that hit us 65 million years ago.
It was originally called the town of our lady the queen of the angels.
The fire from the sun though... You know, it... It comes from somewhere.
Everything good about me was born here.
I think that what happened to us, the answers, are there.
Oh, you can really see why this place spawned so many ghost stories, huh?
So, who is the man who started it all?
Yes, and the latter fuels most of my anger.
My first reaction was that, like the others... This was an arson fire of unknown origin.
Sometimes I like to think that fever of unexplained origin that I never came out of the other side end the rest of my life, none of it ever happened.
Soon it will be learned that someone, an old man of unknown origin, was struck by lightning and after 10 weeks appeared perfectly healthy and young again.
